system.sustained: The Psyker or another individual asks the psyker a single question that can be as vague or specific as they like. Taking Roughly one minute, they make a Focus power Test. They receive an answer, with additional information every 2 Degrees of Success. Psychic Phenomena rolls from this power add +10. Results: 0 DoF: Opposition: Psyker can determine the greatest opposition that will be faced. 2 DoF: Fears, the Psyker also determines other negative forces, equal to their Psy Rating, that may be at play. 4 DoF: Hopes: The Psyker can also determine the greatest advantage or tool the subject has at hand. 6 DoF: Outcome: The Psyker can offer two sentences of advice, granting the subject +10 on a number of tests equal to the psyker's Psy Rating for hte next month, or until the question is resolved, whichever is first.
